resources.string: Accident Spot Prone Locator application integrated with google map that helps in identifying accident prone area called as Blackspot.Whenever you plan to travel, start the navigation on google map and open the app or if you know the route just open AS-Pointer app. It will keep running while you drive towards your destination.As soon as you are within 300 meters range of any spot that is accident prone area this application will give a voice message to you also if your speed is greater than safe speed of that spot. This application will give a voice message to you, so that you are extra watchful about accident prone area.
If AS-Pointer app is not working or some error in running then check in Settings->Application->Application Manager->Accident Alert->Permissions->allow all permission..then check again..

Accident prone Spot Locator application integrated with Google map that helps in identifying accident prone spots and provide voice alert.Whenever you plan to travel,start the navigation on Google map and open the app, it will keep running while you drive towards the destination. As soon as you are within 1km range of any spot that is Accident prone area this application will give a voice alert.
